title: For Trade: 1882 Providence BB Team Cabinet w/4 HOF'ers
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: For Trade: 1882 Providence BB Team Cabinet w/4 HOF'ers
posts.post_content:
I just picked up the above mentioned cabinet card (see scan below) wich includes George Wright, Harry Wright, Charles Radbourne & John Ward and am interested in trading it for a career contemporary cdv/cabinet card (preferably SGC graded) depicting any of the following HOF'ers:

Alexander Cartwright
Henry Chadwick
Candy Cummings (1875 Hartford)
William Hulbert
Sol White 
Frank Grant
1896 Paterson, NJ Team Cabinet w/Honus Wagner
Nego League Team Postcards w/multiple HOF'ers

If you have any of these items and are interested in making a deal, please e-mail me privately at: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]

I am really not interested in selling this card but instead am looking to upgrade my collection.
